title: Installation issue: py-pygtk
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install py-pygtk
...
==> Installing pcre
==> Fetching https://ftp.pcre.org/pub/pcre/pcre-8.42.tar.bz2

    '/home/zvika/spack/var/spack/stage/pcre-8.42-fx4feox5fku33c76hgp4dzzcvleyc2mp/pcre-8.42/configure' '--prefix=/home/zvika/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/pcre-8.42-fx4feox5fku33c76hgp4dzzcvleyc2mp' '--enable-utf' '--enable-unicode-properties'

```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux centos-maty 3.10.0-514.26.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Jun 29 16:05:25 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	CentOS Linux release 7.3.1611 (Core) 
``` 
and, if relevant, post or attach:

- `compilers.yaml`
```
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: null
      f77: null
      fc: null
    spec: gcc@4.8.5
    target: x86_64
```
